thread.title: Joe Ludwig is walking on at Iowa. Wisconsin native Joe Ludwi
thread.title_full: Joe Ludwig is walking on at Iowa. Wisconsin native Joe Ludwi

author: rivals.com
title: Joe Ludwig is walking on at Iowa. Wisconsin native Joe Ludwi
text:
Joe Ludwig is walking on at Iowa. Wisconsin native Joe Ludwig has decided on his college future. The 6-foot-2, 205-pound Ludwig is going to attend the University of Iowa and join the Hawkeye football program as a preferred walk-on this year.
"I just felt at home there," said Ludwig, who visited Iowa City last week. "I also thought the coaching staff was great and the football facilities were awesome."
A hard hitting safety at Middleton High School, Ludwig will be making the transition to linebacker in college at Iowa.
"I'm going to start out as an outside linebacker," Ludwig said. "They said that all players get an equal opportunity to prove themselves and earn playing time there."
Excited to announce I will continue my academic and football career at the University of Iowa! pic.twitter.com/tno36xds3a
â€” Joe Ludwig (@joeludwig19) January 31, 2017 Along with Iowa, Ludwig also considered preferred walk-on offers at Miami of Ohio and San Diego State, among other opportunities.
See highlights from Ludwig's senior year at Middleton in the video below.
Iowa's Class of 2017 walk-ons:
Joe Ludwig - 6-foot-2, 205-pound LB from Middleton, WI (Middleton)
Marshall Coluzzi - 6-foot-0, 215-pound LS from Naperville, IL (North)
Tommy Kujawa - 6-foot-3, 220-pound TE from Greendale, WI (Greendale)
Bryce Schulte - 6-foot-3, 215-pound TE/LB from Cedar Rapids, IA (Xavier)
Cole Hahn - 5-foot-10, 185-pound K from West Des Moines, IA (Valley)
Keegan Glaus - 5-foot-10, 215-pound LB from Bettendorf, IA (Bettendorf)
Ben Campos - 6-foot-2, 219-pound LB from West Des Moines, IA (Valley)
Tommy Herrion - 6-foot-1, 185-pound QB from Wilmette, IL (Loyola Academy)
Jack Kallenberger - 6-foot-5, 250-pound DE from Bettendorf, IA (Iowa Central)
Nick Easley - 6-foot-0, 204-pound WR from Newton, IA (Iowa Western)
Yale Van Dyne Jr . - 6-foot-3, 205-pound WR from Stilwell, KS (Bishop Miege)
